page.title: 04John Blenkinsop Middle Sch.
page.content: The school is very big and has three blocks ,A,B and C blocks.<It sounds like a prison>.There are 35 classrooms in the school and is effected by falling rolls.Sometimes the windows are smashed by vandals.The slates are knocked down by vandals. The pupils love a uniform of blue.There are lots of teachers in the school.Mine were called Mr.Wilding and Mr.Wintle. There is a cookery room ,two art rooms ,two librarys and three halls ,plus a C.D.T Room. The halls are big and each hall has a house point board for house competitions.Everytime you do some good work you get some house points.There are three teams; Eagles, Hawks and Falcons.I was in Eagles.The school also has a football,cricket and rugby teams. By C.Brent.
